articles.description: ​According to authorities, Benson was a resident of Kaithakuzhi in Kollam and was the sole survivor of a family of four, all of them were HIV positive. Police officers said that Benson reportedly worked at a private company owned by his relative.
articles.content: Top Celeb News Today: Alia Bhatt trolled for ditching sindoor, trailer of Ranveer Singhs Jayeshbhai Jordaar out, and more
